com.tiendanube.apisdk

Class ApiCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiendanube.apisdk.ApiCredentials
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ApiCredentials
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents credentials to use for the API. The credentials required are the store id and the access token. You may create a new ApiCredentials object using these data if you know it, or obtain them from an authentication code by using the method ApiCredentials.obtain.
    Author:
    mcolotto
    See Also:
